#summary A compendium of links to alternative products and comparing reviews.

= Libraries =

  * [http://www.highcharts.com/ HighCharts] JS+SVG, Free for non commercial
  * [https://github.com/uiteoi/ico ICO] JS+SVG, MIT, Req:Raphael,Prototyype
  * [http://www.deensoft.com/lab/protochart/index.php Protochart] JS+Canvas, Free?, Req:Prototype,excanvas (plugin ie6)
  * [http://www.filamentgroup.com/lab/update_to_jquery_visualize_accessible_charts_with_html5_from_designing_with/ jQuery Visualize] JS+Canvas, Free, Req:jquery,excanvas (plugin ie6)
  * [http://bluff.jcoglan.com/api.html Bluff] JS+Canvas, GPL+MIT, Req:Excanvas
  * [http://grafico.kilianvalkhof.com/ Grafico] JS+SVG, MIT, Req:Prototype,Raphael
  * [http://www.dojotoolkit.org/reference-guide/dojox/charting.html Dojo Charting] JS+SVG, BSD/Academic, Req: Dojo
  * [http://www.dhtmlx.com/docs/products/dhtmlxChart/index.shtml DHTMLX Charts] JS+HTML, GPL/Commercial, Req:-
  * [http://g.raphaeljs.com/ gRaphael] JS+SVG, MIT, Req: Raphael
  * [http://www.jscharts.com/ JS Charts] JS+Canvas (ie6 comp?), CC/Commercial, Req:-
  * [http://www.liquidx.net/plotkit/ PlotKit] JS+SVG/Canvas, BSD, Req: Excanvas
  * [http://code.google.com/p/flot/ Flot] JS+Canvas, MIT, Req:jquery,excanvas
  * [http://solutoire.com/flotr/ FlotR] JS+Canvas, MIT, Req: Prototype, Excanvas
  * [http://vis.stanford.edu/protovis/ Protovis] JS+SVG (no ie6), BSD
  * [http://www.ejschart.com Emprise JS Charts] JS+Canvas (ie6 comp?), Commercial
